document.full_text: china telecom corp ltd , the smallest of the country's three wireless carriers, is in touch with apple inc  on introducing iphones based on cdma technology, chairman wang xiaochu said on friday.
document.title: china telecom in touch with apple on cdma iphone: chairman
lines_and_colors: china telecom corp ltd , the smallest of the country's three wireless carriers, is in touch with apple inc  on introducing iphones based on cdma technology, chairman wang xiaochu said on friday.
